name: Dilophosaurus Dinosaur Multiplayer
description:
Dilophosaurus Dinosaur Multiplayer- prepare to enter the world as a small but powerful dinosaur. Run your way to victory in this high quality Dilophosaurus simulator. Spray your enemies with fire !! Avoid total chaos and come out as the ultimate top dinosaur.

Customize your Dinosaur with multiple color options.

Realistic 3D Jurassic Environment with T-Rex, Raptors, Pterodactyls, Spinosaurus, and many more.

Note : Choose between the Online Multiplayer and Offline Maps. If you don't want to play with other people, you don't have to.

TOP GAME FEATURES INCLUDE :
-- Chat with other players
-- Both Online and Offline Game Options
-- Breath Fire at your opponents
-- Control your very own Dilophosaurus!!
-- Huge 3D Open World Map
-- 4 Special Skills - Invincibility, Fireball, Ice, Electricity
-- Loaded with enemies like Tyrannosaurus Rex, Raptor, Spinosaurus, Pterodactyl, Mosasaurus and even special Dragons
-- Ultra Realistic Weather Simulation - real weather with highly realistic lightning and thunder effects
-- Tournament style multiplayer mode

Locate all the magic items in the offline map in order to craft your special skills. Be sure to Upgrade your animal speed, strength, and stamina. Use your magic skills selectively against your foes.

Stop by the Wildfoot Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for fun updates and new releases.  We concentrate on making high quality, 3D animal simulators. We're getting better, but we still have a long way to go. Thanks for all your support!
